data.title: The City Library
data.text:
Titles from container.

Originally produced as motion pictures.

Take aim at the police van based on a story by Kazuo Shimada; A Colt is my passport based on a story by Shinji Fujiwara.

I am waiting in standard format; others in widescreen.

I am waiting: cinematography, Kurataro Takamura ; editor, Akira Suzuki ; music, Masaru Sato.

Rusty knife: cinematography, Kurataro Takamura ; editor, Masanori Tsujii ; music, Masaru Sato.

Take aim at the police van: cinematography, Shigeyoshi Mine ; editor, Akira Suzuki ; music, Koichi Kawabe.

Cruel gun story: cinematography, Saburo Isayama ; editor, Masanori Tsujii ; music, Masayoshi Ikeda.

A Colt is my passport: cinematography, Shigeyoshi Mine ; editor, Akira Suzuki ; music, Harumi Ibe.

Cast for I am waiting: Yujiro Ishihara, Mie Kitahara, Isamu Kosugi, Kenjiro Uemura, Hideaki Nitani, Ken Hatano, Kojiro Kusanagi.

Cast for Rusty knife: Yujiro Ishihara, Mie Kitahara, Shoji Yasui, Mari Shiraki, Joe Shishido, Akira Kobayashi, Masao Shimizu, Naoki Sugiura, Toshio Takahara.

Cast for Take aim at the police van: Michitaro Mizushima, Mari Shiraki, Misako Watanabe, Shinsuke Ashida, Shoichi Ozawa, Ryohei Uchida, Toru Abe, Tatsuo Matsushita, Saburo Hiromatsu, Reiko Arai, Toyo Fukuda, Kotoe Hatsui, Hiroshi Osa, Akira Hisamatsu.

Cast for Cruel gun story: Joe Shishido, Chieko Matsubara, Tamio Kawachi, Yuji Odaka, Minako Kazuki, Hiroshi Nihonyanagi, Hiroshi Kondo, Shobun Inoue, Saburo Hiromatsu, Junichi Yamanobe.

Cast for A Colt is my passport: Joe Shishido, Chitose Kobayashi, Jerry Fujio, Shoki Fukae, Zenji Yamada, Hideaki Esumi, Jun Hongo, Akio Miyabe, Toyoko Takechi, Kojiro Kusanagi, Ryotaro Sugi, Takamaru Sasaki, Asao Uchida, Zeko Nakamura, Kanjuro Arashi.

DVD; NTSC; Dolby digital mono.; region 1.

In Japanese, with English subtitles.
